author: craigmcc
msg: Copy the local DTD resources (in package org.apache.jasper.resources) to the
${tomcat.build}/classes directory.  This was probably causing some of the
recent spate of issues with XML parsers wanting to access the Internet because
the local copy of the DTD could not be found.

author: costin
msg: - Context.reload() will invalidate all user servlets ( defined in
web.xml or loaded by interceptors) ( it's a start, I haven't tested all
cases).
- Added "full" reload - equivalent with a server restart. This is the cleanest
form of restart.
- Added dependency check for web.xml. JspInterceptor can also add deps on tag
lib descriptors and use the DependManager to detect changes in jsp files.

author: craigmcc
msg: When accessing a particular request URL triggers form based authentication,
save any query string that was specified for the later redirect.  Note that
this does not solve every problem with form-based login, but this is a
frequently encountered case.
Submitted by: Willie Wheeler <andrew.cmu.edu>

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct a compile error that breaks "./build.sh dist".  This should probably
be rolled into TOMCAT_32 as well.

author: costin
msg: - Added ReloadInterceptor. As promised, the reloading will be re-written
and improved, and this is the first step. Right now we implement almost
the same scheme as before ( so it's not a fix ), but we can move the
whole mess in a repaceable component.
- Added DependManager. It is a (stand-alone) component, with no deps on
tomcat that is able to detect a change in a set of files. It will be
improved in time, but so far it provides enough for tomcat.
It is able to minimize the number of file accesses and perform good
enough.
- Context: on reload, all servlets will be cleaned up.
- started to phase out ServletLoader. AdaptiveServletLoader will still
be around ( to ensure continuity and stability ). The interface will be
removed in few days unless someone is using it ( for new class loaders)
- removed deprecated methods in context.
